statements: DELETE FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 123 AND status = 'Open';
DELETE FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 456 AND support_agent_id = 789 AND status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND priority > 3;
DELETE FROM customersupport_tickets WHERE priority = (SELECT MAX(priority) FROM customersupport_tickets);
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com');
DELETE FROM ticket_comments WHERE ticket_id IN (SELECT ticket_id FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Closed');
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = 101 AND status = 'Open';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 201 OR customer_id = 202;
DELETE FROM ticket_responses WHERE response_time < NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM tickets WHERE status = 'resolved');
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE resolved_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
